name: Mental multiplication and division strategies for integers

skills.name: Recognise and use efficient methods for mental multiplication
Recognise and use the law of distributivity
Recognise and use efficient methods for mental division

explanations.A: If we multiply by 100 we have 100 lots of the number, then we take away one lot of the number to leave 99 lots of the number
explanations.B: Not quite, this would give us 101 lots of the number.
explanations.C: Not quite. We want 100 lots of the number, then we need one less lot to get to 99 lots.
explanations.D: Not quite. We want 100 lots of the number, then we need one less lot to get to 99 lots.

explanations.A: Teddy is first finding how many 25s make 100, and then multiplying this up to get 800.
explanations.B: Not quite, Teddy has found the number of 25s in 100. We then need to multiply this up to get 800.
explanations.C: Not quite. Check how many 25s there are in 100, and then multiply this up to get to 800
explanations.D: Not quite. Check how many 25s there are in 100, and then multiply this up to get to 800

explanations.D: Not quite. Check how many 25s there are in 100, and then multiply this up to get to 900

explanations.A: x 10 x 2 = x 20, We want to divide by 5. What combination of x and divide will give us this?
explanations.B: x 10 ÷ 2 = x 5. We want to divide by 5. What combination of x and divide will give us a divide by 5 overall?
explanations.C: ÷ 10 x 2 = ÷5 so this method is correct.
explanations.D: ÷10 ÷2 = ÷20. We want to divide by 5. What combination will give us this overall?

explanations.A: x 100 x 2 = x 200, We want to divide by 50. What combination of x and divide will give us this?
explanations.B: x 100 ÷ 2 = x 50. We want to divide by 50. What combination of x and divide will give us a divide by 50 overall?
explanations.C: ÷100 ÷2 = ÷200. We want to divide by 50. What combination will give us this overall?
explanations.D: ÷ 100 x 2 = ÷50 so this method is correct.
